isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - CAB FRONT MOUNTING INSULATOR; REPLACE

wtsproc.config: Skirt removal is required if replacing right side mounting insulator on a sleeper cab only. This will allow for access to remove the sleeper cab A/C line clipping bolts.

step1.para: Raise front axle, support with jack stand and remove wheel if vehicle is equipped with chassis skirts

note.para: If replacing right side mounting insulator and vehicle is equipped with chassis skirts AND sleeper cab then remove aerodynamic chassis skirt panels in lieu of removing wheel

step1.para: Remove sleeper cab A/C refrigerant line clipping bolts and reposition lines (RIGHT SIDE WITH SLEEPER CAB ONLY). Cut tie straps and reposition air hose bundle from cab mount bracket (LEFT SIDE ONLY)
Position jack stand under cab and install bottle jack between jack stand and cab

note.para: Be careful to install bottle jack and stand in location that will not damage cab

step1.para: Remove front cab mounting insulator lower cap & bolts

note.para: Do not raise cab higher than is necessary to remove bushing

step1.para: Install cab front mounting insulator & torque to spec
Install front cab mounting insulator lower cap & bolts. Torque to spec
Remove bottle jack and jack stand
Install sleeper cab A/C refrigerant line clipping bolts (RIGHT SIDE WITH SLEEPER CAB ONLY). Install tie straps to secure air hose bundle (LEFT SIDE ONLY)
Install & torque wheel if vehicle is equipped with chassis skirts. Lower front axle assembly

note.para: If replacing right side mounting insulator and vehicle is equipped with chassis skirts AND sleeper cab then install aerodynamic chassis skirt panels
